snippet: The Hopi and San Carlos Apache Indians of Arizona learned that 24 of their items bought by a foundation are going to be returned.
abstract: Hopi and San Carlos Apache Indians of Arizona learn that 24 of the 27 of their sacred artifacts sold at a contested auction in Paris had been bought by the Annenberg Foundation, which plans to return them to the tribes.
lead_paragraph: The Hopi and San Carlos Apache Indians of Arizona learned that 24 of their items bought by a foundation are going to be returned.

headline.main: Arizona: Auctioned Artifacts to Be Returned to Tribes
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Auctioned Artifacts to Be Returned to Tribes
